location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, Prince at Shiraz [Prince Governor of Fars]

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the Imam of Muscat, Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, and his actions concerning the ship Nasret Shaw. It explains that the British Government has no control of the actions of the Imam, though the Resident has submitted Prince Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā's complaint concerning his — the Resident — conduct to the Government of Bombay.
